author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: هَلْ تَرَى مَنْ يَنْصُرُ نَفْسَكَ أَوْ يَتَفَكَّرُ فِيْمَا وَرَدَ عَلَيْهَا فِي حُبِّكَ إِذًا تَوَقَّفَ القَلَمُ يَا مَحْبُوْبَ العَالَمِينَ *
translation: Canst Thou see any who have championed Thy Self, or who ponder on what hath befallen Him in the pathway of Thy love? Now doth My pen halt, O Beloved of the worlds.
